price: ߝߋ߲ ߓߍ߯ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߬ ߡߊߕߙߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߞߣߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߋ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߓߍ߯
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yasaluhu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kulla yawmin huwa fī shanin
